cause.description:
More than 10 million Americans are carrying this disease. It is a genetic disease that is affecting about 30,000 Americans. This disease clogs the lungs and leads to nasty lung infections. Emily is one child that has this. She was born on July 18th, 1995. She was not diagnosed until the age of 2 1/2. This has not slowed her down, however. She loves to dance, and has been in numerous jazz, tap and lyrical dance competitions.
1. This is a serious disease
2. It affects many of us
3. It needs a cure
cause.mission: to fund a cure for cystic fibrosis
cause.name: Emily's Army
